name: #06 - Stasis
description:
(Unmute Sound for Optimal Experience)

Fragment 06 - Stasis
(From the BINARY EMOTIONS series)

"It is not my mind to ask questions that cannot be answered. That is the soul standing upon the crossroad of vacillation. You search for wisdom, but achieve only a stasis of will."

Stasis: It's dedicated to that moment where being in stasis causes disruption. The moment where one chooses to be different and sets inward a particular motion. In that waking moment, you decide your destiny.
--
"BINARY EMOTIONS" is a series based on 12 Single Edition Fragments in which the artist aims to translate his inner nuances within a specific moment into visuals that evoke certain emotions. An emotional journey digitized into a binary piece cataloged onto the blockchain.
